MacIntuneManifest.Name: CIS Level 2 - Application Access Restrictions
MacIntuneManifest.Description: Comprehensive privacy and security restrictions for macOS applications. This CIS Level 2 security baseline control disables multiple data collection and sharing features including: AirDrop, Siri/Assistant, iCloud Desktop/Documents sync, content caching, diagnostic submission, personalized advertising, external intelligence integrations (AI), Mail summary, media sharing, Notes transcription, and Writing Tools. Enforces on-device-only dictation and a 30-day software update delay. These controls minimize data exposure, prevent unauthorized sharing, and reduce attack surface by limiting cloud-connected features.
